org.jogger
Interface Middleware

All Known Implementing Classes:
RouterMiddleware, StaticMiddleware
public interface Middleware

A middleware provides functionality to the life cycle of the request. Examples of what middlewares could do include: serving static files, handling exceptions, routing requests or provide session management.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Summary
 void handle(Request request, Response response, MiddlewareChain chain)
          This method is called by Jogger when a request arrives.
 

Method Detail

handle

void handle(Request request,
            Response response,
            MiddlewareChain chain)
            throws Exception
This method is called by Jogger when a request arrives. Notice that the implementation has to call MiddlewareChain.next() to execute the next middlewares.

Parameters:
request - the Jogger HTTP request.
response - the Jogger HTTP response.
chain - an object used to call the next middleware.
Throws:
Exception
